bibl.title: with contributions by A. BENAISSA, L. CAPPONI, N. GONIS, Chr. MÜLKE, D. OBBINK, P.M. PINTO, F. SCHIRONI, G. UCCIARDELLO, G.A. XENIS, J. YUAN, and A.G. BERESFORD, M.P. POBJOY, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXI (Nos 4803-4843). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 91.)
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXXI, 4803-4843. - I. Theological Texts (4803-4806). - II. New Literary Texts (4807-4812). - III. Homer and Homerica (4813-4821). - IV. Documentary Texts (4822-4837). - V. Drawings (4838-4843). [List of numbers in The Oxyrhynchus Papyri series allocated in advance to 6 drawings (edited elsewhere).]
